actions.name: AddPeerCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to add a peer cluster to a multi-Region cluster

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to create new clusters

actions.name: CreateMultiRegionClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to create multi-Region clusters. Creating multi-Region clusters also requires CreateCluster permission in each specified Region. **This action is deprecated as of 05/09/2025 and will be removed on 05/21/2025.**

actions.name: DbConnect
actions.description: Grants permission to connect to the database

actions.name: DbConnectAdmin
actions.description: Grants permission to connect to the database with admin role. Connecting with any other role requires DbConnect permission

actions.name: DeleteCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a cluster and all of its data

actions.name: DeleteMultiRegionClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to delete multi-Region clusters. Deleting multi-Region clusters also requires DeleteCluster permission in each specified Region. **This action is deprecated as of 05/09/2025 and will be removed on 05/21/2025.**

actions.name: GetCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a cluster

actions.name: GetVpcEndpointServiceName
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the VPC endpoint service name for a cluster

actions.name: ListClusters
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of clusters

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Aurora DSQL resource

actions.name: PutMultiRegionProperties
actions.description: Grants permission to update multi-Region properties of a cluster

actions.name: PutWitnessRegion
actions.description: Grants permission to configure and update the witness Region of a multi-Region cluster

actions.name: RemovePeerCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a peer cluster from a multi-Region cluster

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to Aurora DSQL resources

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from Aurora DSQL resources

actions.name: UpdateCluster
actions.description: Grants permission to modify cluster attributes
